headline: Rocket Travel by Agoda Launches the Loyalty Value Playbook to Help Travel Leaders Stay Ahead of the Loyalty Game
summary: As customer expectations rapidly evolve, their perception of traditional loyalty models evolves with it. As a result, many loyalty programs face a widening "value gap" between what members want and what brands deliver, according to a new report co-developed by Skift and Rocket Travel by Agoda - the strategic partnerships arm of digital travel platform Agoda.

headline: Agoda Unveils Eerie Destinations Across Asia for Halloween
summary: To mark Halloween, digital travel platform Agoda has released a curated list of five destinations in Asia known for their haunting beauty and eerie folklore. These locations are perfect for travelers seeking a touch of the supernatural, offering mysterious tales and paranormal occurrences. Adventurers drawn to ghostly legends or the allure of the unknown are invited to embrace the Halloween spirit with something thrilling and out of the ordinary at each of these destinations.
